translations.translation: and other sufferings of the kind.
Taste the scalding water, pus, and other putrid things".
And similar other punishments in pairs.
And other of similar kind - all together!
And other (punishment) of the same kind-- of various sorts.
and other torments of the like kind coupled together.
And other (torment) of the kind in pairs (the two extremes)!
And other torments, like thereof, conjoined.
and other kinds [of torments] resembling it.’
And other Penalties of a similar kind, to match them!
And other torments of similar kind, all together!
and other similar to it, joined together.
And similar torments of diverse kinds.
And other [punishments] of its type [in various] kinds.

[38:58] and other (ākhar may be plural or singular) kinds [of torment] resembling it, in other words, like the boiling water and pus mentioned, in pairs, of all sorts, in other words, their chastisement will consist of various kinds.

(And other (torment) of the kind) of burning heat and ice cold draught (in pairs (the two extremes)!) different kinds of torment. Allah will cast them in the Fire one after another, in order of merit, whenever a generation of people enters it, they curse those who entered the Fire before them.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { مِن شَكْلِهِ أَزْوَاجٌ } معناه ضَربهُ
 والأزواجُ: عذابٌ من الزَّمهريرِ
 وقال: ألوانٌ من العَذابِ

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ وآخَرُ } أي: وعذاب آخر، أو: مذوق آخر، { من شَكْلِه } من مثل العذاب المذكور
 وقرأ البصري: " أُخَرُ " بالجمع، أي: ومذوقات أُخَرُ من شكل هذا العذاب في الشدّة والفظاظة، { أزواجٌ } أي: أصناف، وهو خبر لأخر، أو: صفة له، أو: للثلاثة
